extendedInfo.description: Watch your favorite Machinima videos in high quality wherever you go! Download our updated App for your Android devices.For best viewing experience, use a WiFi connection. What is Machinima? Machinima is the premier online network providing entertainment for the gaming culture, showing game trailers, gameplay videos and tips, video game reviews, first looks, and original series created in video games. One of the most viewed YouTube channels in the world! Â· Subscribe to your favorite Machinima shows & receive push notifications to your Droid. Â· Sort through top videos of the day, week, month, and of all-time. Â· Watch the most popular videos on the Machinima Network including all your favorite gameplay videos. Â· Keep up with gaming news, reviews, behind the scenes and Machinima videos. Stay connected with Sark, Hutch, The Dead Pixel, Khail, Hundar, Constant and the team. Subscribe to your favorite Machinima series and shows including: Â· Inside Gaming Â· Respawn Â· Realm Â· Replay Â· Camp Hutch Â· Arby 'n' The Chief Â· Versus Â· Headshot Â· ETC Â· Engineering Win with Hutch Â· Ten For the Win Â· Sanity Not Included Â· All Your History Â· Benbujaâs Sunts, Bloopers and Silly Stuff   Excluisve Tejb Show  Machinima-To-GoAnd be sure to post a review, rate our application, and let us know any issues you are having or features youâd like to see in future releases. Watch us on YouTube: www.youtube.com/machinima and www.youtube.com/machinimarespawn Join our Facebook fanpage: http://www.facebook.com/machinima Follow us on Twitter: http://twitter.com/machinima_com

reviews.title: Used to be perfect
reviews.comment: Ive had this app for a while. Back in the day when it didnt take an eternity to open and then crash just to be opened and load for another eternity then finally work, it used to be perfect but now it even puts images into my gallery. Seriously?
reviews.author: Scott Daniels

reviews.title: How about some options
reviews.comment: Great app but i wish there was an option to turn off the notifications. Five stars for that option. also you can\'t unsubscribe to any videos and it loads pictures into your gallery. fix this and maybe I\'ll re download.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesnt update.
reviews.comment: The app doesnt update the latest videos.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: When are you gonna fix it
reviews.comment: When you go into whats popular it shows you the most popular of all time no mater what tab you click. Apart from that its a great app just needs patched.
reviews.author: JONATHAN BOYD

reviews.title: This seems weird.
reviews.comment: I have seen some feedbacks about getting too much notification. My problem here is I\'m not receiving any Notification and It seems that its not updating the playlists.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Come on really?
reviews.comment: User interface seems very poor as if the app is just a mobile site instead of a native android experience.  Secondly, subscription notifications are annoying as the app nofities every video updated instead of the ones a user may have just subbed for. Please revamp the app whenever. Holo design from the android basics should help make a turn around for the app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Absolute garbage
reviews.comment: It automatically subscribes you to every video series, regardless of whether or not you unsubscribe then spams the crap out you with notifications that you can\'t turn off. Used to be an awesome app, now I had to uninstall.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Really awesome but...
reviews.comment: Not optimised for tablets. The whole interface is all fukked up on my nexus 7. Still an awesome app.
reviews.author: Jonathan Lessard

reviews.title: Amazing!
reviews.comment: This app directs you to wherever you wanna go and is absolutly perfect 5 stars plus great for ios too
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Spams with notifications
reviews.comment: Sends notifications to every video they post without subscribing!!! Wtf!?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Machmania rocks
reviews.comment: This app works fine for my phone its epic and awsome
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great content but...
reviews.comment: ...awful design!  You guys need to hire a professional app designer. Badly.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: App is amazing
reviews.comment: I love machinima I have been subsribing to the for 2 years now and love watching there videos and this just makes it easier for me
reviews.author: Trushil Patel

reviews.title: Use to like it but no longer
reviews.comment: Uninstalling this app because of the annoying notifications! Why have a settings button if all you can do is log in with your Facebook and share the app? That\'s not settings, that\'s just increasing machinima\'s own fan base!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: works alright..
reviews.comment: keeps adding photos of random stuff to my phone and i cant stop it
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Xperia z
reviews.comment: This application does my head in keeps adding photos to my library that I don\'t want! And just has a load of crap on it! Only use this for the trailers part and not many are put up.
reviews.author: andrew hayes

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: This app is amazing on my Samsung galaxy note2 everything works great.
reviews.author: Richie Jimenez

reviews.title: Sucks
reviews.comment: Does not show parts of the app on samsung admire. Very dissapointing.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fix this broken garbage
reviews.comment: This app is trash, every single time you launch it the app subscribes you to everything on it. It\'s like a freaking virus. DO NOT INSTALL!!!!!
reviews.author: A Google User
